factual: What are the maximum combined sentences allowed for juvenile offenders aged between 14 and under 16 who commit multiple crimes?
scenario_based: A teenager, aged 15, was convicted of two theft offenses—one when they were 13 and another after turning 15. How would a court determine their combined sentence according to the law?
